sqlMap.sql: SELECT B_H.ID,B_H.ResidenceID, B_H.PropertyArea from basedata.house B_H INNER JOIN house_interaction V_HI ON V_HI.houseid = B_H.id AND V_HI.status > 0 INNER JOIN admin.account V_A ON V_HI.agentid = V_A.id AND V_A.status = 1 WHERE B_H.status = 1 AND V_HI.StartDate <= now() AND V_HI.EndDate >= now()

SELECT B_H.ID,B_H.ResidenceID, B_H.PropertyArea from basedata.house B_H INNER JOIN house_interaction V_HI ON V_HI.houseid = B_H.id AND V_HI.status > 0 INNER JOIN admin.account V_A ON V_HI.agentid = V_A.id AND V_A.status = 1 WHERE B_H.status = 1 AND V_HI.StartDate <= now() AND V_HI.EndDate >= now() AND B_H.ResidenceID = #id#

SELECT rd.ID, (SELECT IFNULL(AVG(S.Price/H.PropertyArea), 0) FROM basedata.house_sale S LEFT JOIN ( ) H ON H.ID = S.HouseID WHERE rd.ID = H.ResidenceID AND S.SaleStatus = 1) AS Price FROM residence AS rd WHERE rd.status = 1 AND (SELECT count(1) FROM basedata.house BH WHERE rd.ID = BH.ResidenceID) > 0

SELECT rd.ID, rd.Address, rg.CityID, rg.ParentID as PlateID, rg.Name plateName, rg2.Name regionName, rd.Name as residenceName FROM residence AS rd JOIN region AS rg ON rd.regionID = rg.regionID JOIN region AS rg2 ON rg.parentID = rg2.regionID JOIN admin.account_residence_relationship rs ON rs.ResidenceID = rd.ID JOIN mobile.google_map_place_base AS mg ON rd.ID = mg.ResidenceID WHERE rd.status = 1 AND mg.IsMain = 1 AND rs.accountID = #brokerId#
